text: The 8th South Indian International Movie Awards is an awards event held at Qatar on August 15th and 16th, 2019.SIIMA Awards 2019: Here’s a complete list of nominees SIIMA 2019 recognized the best films and performances from the past year in Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam and Kannada films and music released in 2018, along with special honors for lifetime contributions and a few special awards. The nomination list for the main awards was announced in July 2019. == Honorary awards == * Suresh Kumar & Menaka Sureshkumar (Lifetime Achievement) == Main awards winners and nominees == (in Telugu) === Film === {| class="wikitable" | |- ! colspan="2" ! style="background:#eedd82; width:3000px; text-align:center;"|Best Film |- ! ! style="background:#efac00; width:50%; text-align:center;"|Tamil ! ! style="background:#efeb00; width:50%; text-align:center;"|Telugu |- | valign="top" | *Pariyerum Perumal – Neelam Productions **96 – Madras Enterprises **Kadaikutty Singam – 2D Entertainment **Sarkar – Sun Pictures **Vada Chennai – Wunderbar Films | valign="top" | *Mahanati – Vyjayanthi Movies **Aravinda Sametha Veera Raghava – Haarika & Hasinee Creations **Bharat Ane Nenu – DVV Entertainments **Geetha Govindam – GA2 Pictures **Rangasthalam – Mythri Movie Makers |- ! ! style="background:#00def3; text-align:center;"| Kannada ! ! style="background:#4df300; text-align:center;"| Malayalam |- | *K.G.F: Chapter 1 – Hombale Films **Ayogya – Crystal Park Cinemas **Raambo 2 – Ladoo Cinema House & De Arte Studios **Sarkari Hi. Chithra – "Mrudumandahaasam" from Poomaram **Prarthana Indrajith – "Laletta" from Mohanlal **Shreya Ghoshal – "Neermathalam" from Aami |} ==Critics' choice== ;Tamil Cinema *Best Actor - Jayam Ravi – Adanga Maru *Best Actress - Aishwarya Rajesh – Kanaa ;Telugu Cinema *Best Actor - Vijay Deverakonda – Geetha Govindam *Best Actress - Samantha Akkineni – Rangasthalam ;Kannada Cinema *Best Actor - Yash - K.G.F Chapter - 1 *Best Actress - Manvitha Harish - Tagaru ;Malayalam Cinema *Best Actor - Prithviraj Sukumaran – Koode *Best Actress - Trisha – Hey Jude ==Special Jury Awards== *Special Appreciation Jury Award : Sudheer Babu – Sammohanam *Special Jury for Outstanding performance : Kathir – Pariyerum Perumal *Special Jury for Child Artist (Tamil) : Master Aarav Ravi – Tik Tik Tik ==Generation Next Awards== ** Entertainer of the Year : TBA **Generation Next Superstar : TBA **Most Popular Star in the Middle East : Mohanlal **Popular Celebrity on Social Media : Vijay Devarakonda **Style Icon of the Year : Yash == References == ==External links== * Official website Category:South Indian International Movie Awards Category:2019 Indian film awards
title: 8th South Indian International Movie Awards
